location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 548 of 1827 from William Newnham, Secretary to the Governor of Bombay, Bombay Castle, to the Resident in the Persian Gulf at Bushire [Ephraim Gerrish Stannus]

mods.abstract: William Newnham transmits under flying seal (not enclosed) depatch no. 543 to the Envoy in Persia. Newnham notes that letters from the late Resident, Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, and David Wilson have been forwarded to the Envoy.
